00063 class cGenericEffect

00069     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00070       
00072     cGenericEffect(cGenericObject* a_parent); 
00073

00076 
00077 
00078     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00079     // METHODS:
00080     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 
00083     virtual bool computeForce(const cVector3d& a_toolPos,
00084                               const cVector3d& a_toolVel,
00085                               const unsigned int& a_toolID,
00086                               cVector3d& a_reactionForce)
00087                               {
00088                                   a_reactionForce.zero();
00089                                   return (false);
00090                               }
00091 
00093     cVector3d getLastComputedForce() { return (m_lastComputedForce); }
00094 
00096     cGenericObject* m_parent;
00097 
00099     inline void enable(bool a_status) { m_enabled = a_status; }
00100 
00102     inline bool isEnabled() { return (m_enabled); }
